description.value:
Cephalumes form symbiotic unions with krikiks, a living biological augmentation unique to their race. Most cephalumes have one of the following krikik symbiotes.

  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.kVX3HmEWCMo3IVjt]{Airjet Krikik} An air bladder in the krikik increases the cephalume’s land and swim speeds by 10 feet. Once per day as a swift action, the cephalume can double their movement speed for that round.
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.RuLAsNWRjrQTw20K]{Electrostatic Krikik} The krikik is covered in thin, electrically charged spines that allow the cephalume to cause any weapon they wield to deal half its damage as electricity damage, becoming lethal and non-archaic if it is not already. If the weapon already deals two damage types, this effect replaces one with electricity. In addition, this allows the cephalume to grant any weapon they wield the staggered critical hit effect. If the weapon has any other critical hit effects, the cephalume chooses only one to apply on a critical hit.
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.ZjhJlorHuBzNcHhs]{Sharprock Krikik} The krikik’s hard crust grants the cephalume a +1 species bonus to AC.
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.vTbPpkbiK72FMKAs]{Siltsight Krikik} The krikik has heat-sensitive eyes that allow the cephalume to double the range of their @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#darkvision]{Darkvision} and to see through non-magical fog, mist, and clouds without penalty, ignoring any cover or concealment bonuses from those effects. without penalty, ignoring any cover or concealment bonuses from those effects.
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.NDdI8CMQEPsajiBp]{Tentacle Krikik} The krikik has a prehensile tentacle that increases the cephalume’s natural reach by 5 feet.
